panels.description: The number of Teleport services that are connected to an Auth Service instance grouped by version.
panels.title: Connected Teleport Versions

panels.description: Count and version of Teleport agents connected to Teleport Cloud.
panels.title: Connected Teleport Versions

panels.description: Number of resources connected to Teleport Cluster.
panels.title: Connected Resources

panels.description: Number of reverse SSH tunnels connected to the Teleport Proxy Service by Teleport instances.
panels.title: Tunnels

panels.description: Automatic updates can be controlled both by customers and us. We control them through autoupdate_version, and customers control the autoupdate_config resource. The autoudpate_agent_rollout resource is the combination of both settings.
panels.title: Auto Update Mode

panels.description:
The rollout state aggregates the state of every group. It becomes active as soon when the first group is udpated, and done when the last group is updated.

The operator takes update decision based on this state. For example, if we had an unstarted v1 -> v2 rollout and we want to update to v3, the operator will chose to do v1 -> v3 instead of v2 -> v3.
panels.title: Rollout State

panels.description: Percentage of write requests to the backend that succeed.

targets.expr:
1 - ((
        sum by ($metrics_per) (rate(backend_write_requests_failed_total{component="backend",namespace="$namespace",job=~"$teleport_job"}[$__rate_interval]))
        - 
        sum by ($metrics_per) (rate(teleport_backend_write_requests_failed_precondition_total{component="backend",namespace="$namespace",job=~"$teleport_job"}[$__rate_interval])) OR on() vector(0)
    ) / (
        sum by ($metrics_per) (rate(backend_write_requests_total{component="backend",namespace="$namespace",job=~"$teleport_job"}[$__rate_interval])) OR on() vector(1)
    ))

panels.title: Backend Write Availability

panels.description: Percentage of write requests to the backend that succeed.

targets.expr:
1- ((
    (
        (sum by ($metrics_per) (rate(backend_read_requests_failed_total{component="backend",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) OR vector(0))
            /
        (sum by ($metrics_per) (rate(backend_read_requests_total{component="backend",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) OR on() vector(1))
    )
  )) or group by ($metrics_per) (rate(backend_read_requests_total{component="backend",namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Backend Read Availability

list.description: Filter metrics based on prometheus' `job` label.
list.name: teleport_job

list.description: For per-instance metrics show metrics based on `pod` label if available, otherwise use `instance` label.
list.name: metrics_per

list.description: Kubernetes namespace selector. Available only for Kubernetes deployments.
list.name: namespace
